title: Best of The Herd: 04/04/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 04/04/2019
description:
Colin says the Lakers do not have a plan and there is no light at the end of the tunnel for the LeBron era in LA.  He talks about why the Bleacher Report article about the Aaron Rodgers/Mike McCarthy relationship makes McCarthy look really bad.  He thinks Kevin Durant could prove the media right if he chooses to leave the Warriors for the Knicks.  Plus, Super Bowl Champion and former Packers WR Greg Jennings comes in studio to tell Colin how bad it was being around Aaron Rodgers and Mike McCarthy.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
